build: <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/battoujutsu-leap.png} tip={Battoujutsu Leap}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/center-ki.png} tip={Center Ki}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/shouryuusen.png} tip={Shouryuusen}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/sanrenzan.png} tip={Sanrenzan}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/surging-blade.png} tip={Surging Blade}>

<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/vapor-blade.png} tip={Vapor Blade}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/katana-booster.png} tip={Katana Booster}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/unfaltering-blade.png} tip={Unfaltering Blade}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/military-might.png} tip={Military Might}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/jin-sanrenzan.png} tip={Jin Sanrenzan}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/falcon-dive.png} tip={Falcon Dive}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/rising-slash.png} tip={Rising Slash}>

<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/warriors-heart.png} tip={Warrior's Heart}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/willow-dodge.png} tip={Willow Dodge}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/merciless-blade.png} tip={Merciless Blade}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/fuu-sanrenzan.png} tip={Fuu Sanrenzan}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/whirlwind-cut.png} tip={Whirlwind Cut}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/sweeping-sword.png} tip={Sweeping Sword}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/dankuusen.png} tip={Dankuusen}>

<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/bloodletter.png} tip={Bloodletter}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/eye-for-an-eye.png} tip={Eye for an Eye}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/rai-sanrenzan.png} tip={Rai Sanrenzan}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/akatsuki-warrior.png} tip={Akatsuki Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/bushidos-will.png} tip={Bushido's Will}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/cleaver.png} tip={Cleaver}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/jinsoku.png} tip={Jinsoku}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/hitokiri-strike.png} tip={Hitokiri Strike}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/shinsoku.png} tip={Shinsoku}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/sudden-strike.png} tip={Sudden Strike}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/tornado-blade.png} tip={Tornado Blade}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/shinsoku-reinforce.png} tip={Shinsoku - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/shinsoku-extra-strike.png} tip={Shinsoku - Extra Strike}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/shinsoku-boss-rush.png} tip={Shinsoku - Boss Rush}> Shinsoku - Reinforce, Extra Strike and Boss Rush_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/hitokiri-strike-persist.png} tip={Hitokiri Strike - Persist}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/hitokiri-strike-cooldown-cutter.png} tip={Hitokiri Strike - Cooldown Cutter}> Hitokiri Strike- Persist and Cooldown Cutter_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/shinsoku.png} tip={Shinsoku / Akatsuki Trace (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/hitokiri-hundred-strike.png} tip={Hitokiri Hundred Strike / Summer Rain (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/rai-sanrenzan.png} tip={Sanrenzan / Blade Flash (4th Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/falcons-honor.png} tip={Falcon's Honor (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/sudden-strike.png} tip={Sudden Strike (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/hitokiri-strike.png} tip={Hitokiri Strike (4th Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
The last skill from the Secondary Trio can be any skill of your preference
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/hitokiri-hundred-strike.png} tip={Hitokiri Hundred Strike / Summer Rain (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/surging-blade.png} tip={Surging Blade / Shouryuusen (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/vapor-blade.png} tip={Vapor Blade / Rising Slash / Falcon Dive (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/sweeping-sword.png} tip={Sweeping Sword / Whirlwind Cut / Dankuusen (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/rai-sanrenzan.png} tip={Sanrenzan / Blade Flash (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/tornado-blade.png} tip={Tornado Blade (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/sudden-strike.png} tip={Sudden Strike (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/shinsoku.png} tip={Shinsoku / Akatsuki Trace (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/hitokiri-strike.png} tip={Hitokiri Strike (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/falcons-honor.png} tip={Falcon's Honor (Hyper Skill)}>

extraContent.title: Sword Energy and Stances
content: Hayato has two different stances, <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/normal-stance.png} tip={Normal Stance (Beginner Skill)}> Normal Stance and <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/quick-draw.png} tip={Quick Draw (Beginner Skill)}> Quick Draw Stance. You can switch between stances at any time using the Beginner skill, <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/quick-draw.png} tip={Quick Draw (Beginner Skill)}> Quick Draw

The main purpose of Normal Stance is for mobbing while Quick Draw Stance's main purpose is for bossing. Additionally, in <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/normal-stance.png} tip={Normal Stance (Beginner Skill)}>, you gain access to a Double Jump skill <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/battoujutsu-leap.png} tip={Battoujutsu Leap (1st Job)}> and in <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/quick-draw.png} tip={Quick Draw (Beginner Skill)}>, you gain access to a horizontal dash skill <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/battoujutsu-dash.png} tip={Battoujutsu Dash (1st Job)}> and a Double Jump skill <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/quick-leap.png} tip={Quick Leap (1st Job)}>
Hayato also has a secondary resource called Sword Energy which certain skills consume. With Sword Energy, you also gain bonus stats depending on the amount you have

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/normal-stance.png} tip={Normal Stance (Beginner Skill)}> Defeating enemies in this stance grants 5 Sword Energy_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/quick-draw.png} tip={Quick Draw (Beginner Skill)}> Successful attacks in this stance grants 2 Sword Energy_>
These skills below generate Sword Energy when used:

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/battoujutsu-advance.png} tip={Battoujutsu Advance (1st Job)}> Battoujutsu Advance [1st Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/falcons-honor.png} tip={Falcon's Honor (Hyper Skill)}> Falcon's Honor [Hyper Skill]_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/battoujutsu-zankou.png} tip={Battoujutsu Zankou (5th Job)}> Battoujutsu Zankou [5th Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/battoujutsu-ultimate-will-god-of-blades.png} tip={Battoujutsu Ultimate Will (5th Job)}> Battoujutsu Ultimate Will [5th Job]_>
These skills cost Sword Energy to use:

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/normal-stance.png} tip={Normal Stance (Beginner Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/quick-draw.png} tip={Quick Draw (Beginner Skill)}> Stance Switch - Costs a maximum of 100 Sword Energy, can be used when you have less than 100 Sword Energy_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/iaijutsu-phantom-blade.png} tip={Iaijutsu Phantom Blade (5th Job)}> Iaijutsu Phantom Blade [5th Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/battoujutsu-ultimate-will-god-of-blades.png} tip={Battoujutsu Ultimate Will (5th Job)}> Battoujutsu Ultimate Will [5th Job]_>

primary.name: Master of Blades
primary.shortDesc: Permanent Speed Increase 20, Maximum Speed 165, Jump 10, Katana Mastery Increase: 80%, Willpower: 30

primary.name: Shimada Heart
primary.shortDesc: Permanent Damage Increase: 0.5%, Defense: +100 Defense (Current Damage Increased: -%)
primary.desc: Grants %Damage based on your DEF stat up to a 49% Damage bonus

primary.name: Return of the Five Planets
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Momijigaoka upon use.\nCooldown 600 sec

primary.name: Quick Draw
primary.shortDesc: Max Sword Energy Cost: 100
primary.desc: Change stances between Normal and Quick Draw stance that allows you to use different skills
details: [Normal Stance]: While active, gain increased %Attack, HP, MP, %Ignore DEF
[Quick Draw Stance]: While active, gain increased %Boss Damage, Attack Speed (by 1 stage), and %Stun chance<bp_In 3rd job, gain a damaging aura around you that can trigger Damage Reflect_>
Based on the amount of Sword Energy currently active, the amount of bonus stats gained increases
Changing stances consumes Sword Energy (up to 100)
Also permanently provides +100% Knockback Resistance in both stances

primary.name: Summer Rain
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 220%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Triggers chase cut 4 times, which attacks 15 times, +15% damage for 120 sec.\nCooldown: 120 sec.
primary.desc: Unleash your ultimate attack
details: Skill is obtained during 4th Job Advancement
Upon use, grants a buff that increases %Damage
Shares a cooldown and Key Slot with <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/hitokiri-hundred-strike.png} tip={Hitokiro Hundred Strike (Beginner Skill)}>

primary.name: Hitokiri Hundred Strike
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 220%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Triggers chase cut 4 times, which attacks 15 times, +15% damage for 120 sec\nCooldown: 120 sec.
primary.desc: Unleashes your ultimate attack
details: Skill is obtained during 4th Job Advancement
Upon use, grants a buff that increases %Damage
Shares a cooldown and Key Slot with <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/summer-rain.png} tip={Summer Rain (Beginner Skill)}>

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/57/A_God_Among_Horses} title={"A God Among Horses"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Sanrenzan
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 5
1st Hit - Damage: 120%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 3
2nd Hit - Damage: 120%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 3
3rd Hit - Damage: 120%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Slash forward consecutively up to 3 times
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by using the Attack Key
Shares Skill Points (SP) and the same Key Slot as <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/blade-flash.png} tip={Blade Flash (1st Job)}>
Can be linked with <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/surging-blade.png} tip={Surging Blade (1st Job)}> meaning that you can dash between each slash to dodge

primary.name: Blade Flash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Damage: 180%, Max Enemies Hit: 1 Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Strike forward dealing damage to a single enemy
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by using the Attack Key
Shares Skill Points (SP) and the same Key Slot as <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/sanrenzan.png} tip={Sanrenzan (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Surging Blade
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 8, Damage: 75%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Dashes forward.
primary.desc: Dash forward while pushing enemies back
details: Can be used consecutively up to 4 times without any delay

primary.name: Center Ki
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Battoujutsu Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, Adds an extra jump when used in midair. Can be used 2 times back to back.
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
Shares Skill Points (SP) and the same Key Slot as <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/battoujutsu-dash.png} tip={Battoujutsu Dash (1st Job)}>
Can be used twice in a row

primary.name: Battoujutsu Dash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Dash left or right as desired.
primary.desc: Dash skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing the Arrow Key of the direction you want to go twice (Left or Right)
Shares Skill Points (SP) and the same Key Slot as <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/battoujutsu-leap.png} tip={Battoujutsu Leap (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Shouryuusen
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Damage: 100%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 5, Lifts enemies into air.
primary.desc: Strike forward and lift enemies upwards

primary.name: Battoujutsu Advance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Duration: 15 sec, Damage increases by 2%, and sword energy is restored by 8 when using skills related to Battoujutsu, Culmulative Damage Increase Cooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Unleash each learned Battoujutsu attack back to back
details: [Passive]: Permanently, when a Battoujutsu attack is used, grants a stacking %Damage buff and restores 8 Sword Energy

primary.name: Quick Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Dash left or right as desired.
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Jin Sanrenzan
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 9
1st Hit - Damage: 180%, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Number of Attacks: 4
2nd Hit - Damage: 180%, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Number of Attacks: 4
3rd Hit - Damage: 180%, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Slash forward consecutively up to 3 times
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by using the Attack Key

The Attack Key will now use this skill instead of <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/sanrenzan.png} tip={Sanrenzan (1st Job)}><bp_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/sanrenzan.png} tip={Sanrenzan (1st Job)}> can still be used by assigning it to a Key Slot_>
Shares Skill Points (SP) and the same Key Slot as <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/jin-blade-flash.png} tip={Jin Blade Flash (2nd Job)}>
Can be linked with <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/surging-blade.png} tip={Surging Blade (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Jin Blade Flash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 210%, Max Enemies Hit: 1 Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Strike forward dealing damage to a single enemy
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by using the Attack Key

The Attack Key will now use this skill instead of <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/blade-flash.png} tip={Blade Flash (1st Job)}><bp_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/blade-flash.png} tip={Blade Flash (1st Job)}> can still be used by assigning it to a Key Slot_>
Shares Skill Points (SP) and the same Key Slot as <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/jin-sanrenzan.png} tip={Jin Sanrenzan (2nd Job)}>

primary.name: Military Might
primary.shortDesc: Max HP and Max MP: +20%, Physical Attack Power: +15, Speed: +20, Jump: +10

primary.name: Vapor Blade
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, Damage: 100%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Jumps during attack
primary.desc: Leap upwards while damaging enemies in your path
details: Can be assigned to a Key Slot or activated by pressing the Up Key twice<bp_Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock to prevent it from activating with the Arrow Keys_>

Can be linked when used first with:<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/shouryuusen.png} tip={Shouryuusen (1st Job)}> Shouryuusen (1st Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/whirlwind-cut.png} tip={Whirlwind Cut (3rd Job)}> Whirlwind Cut (3rd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/sanrenzan.png} tip={Sanrenzan (1st - 4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/blade-flash.png} tip={Blade Flash Skills (1st - 4th Job)}> Sanrenzan & Blade Flash Skills (1st - 4th Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/dankuusen.png} tip={Dankuusen (3rd Job)}> Dankuusen (3rd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/hitokiri-strike-angle.png} tip={Hitokori Strike - Angle (4th Job)}> Hitokori Strike - Angle (4th Job)_>
When landing there is a delay where you cannot move unless one of the skills above is used

primary.name: Katana Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Duration: 200 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Unfaltering Blade
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +40%, Critical Damage +30%

primary.name: Rising Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55, Damage: 170%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Enemies are launched into air when they are hit.
primary.desc: Slash upwards launching enemies in front of you into the air

primary.name: Falcon Dive
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 170%, Number of Attacks: 6
primary.desc: Leap into the air and dive downwards

primary.name: Fuu Sanrenzan
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 13, 1st Hit - Damage: 260%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 4
2nd Hit - Damage: 260%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 4
3rd Hit - Damage: 260%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 4
Required Skill: Jin Sanrenzan Lv. 20+
primary.desc: Slash forward consecutively up to 3 times
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by using the Attack Key

The Attack Key will use this skill instead of <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/jin-sanrenzan.png} tip={Jin Sanrenzan (2nd Job)}><bp_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/jin-sanrenzan.png} tip={Jin Sanrenzan (2nd Job)}> can still be used by assigning it to a Key Slot_>
Shares Skill Points (SP) and the same Key Slot as <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/fuu-blade-flash.png} tip={Fuu Blade Flash (3rd Job)}>
Can be linked with <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/surging-blade.png} tip={Surging Blade (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Fuu Blade Flash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 270%, Max Enemies Hit: 1 Number of Attacks: 5
primary.desc: Strike forward dealing damage to a single enemy
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by using the Attack Key

The Attack Key will now use this skill instead of <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/jin-blade-flash.png} tip={Jin Blade Flash (2nd Job)}><bp_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/jin-blade-flash.png} tip={Jin Blade Flash (2nd Job)}> can still be used by assigning it to a Key Slot_>

primary.name: Sweeping Sword
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 31, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 210%, Number of Attacks: 6
primary.desc: Blink forward and slashes back to your previous position
details: Enemies hit are pulled to your position

primary.name: Whirlwind Cut
primary.shortDesc: Active Effect: MP Cost: 33, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 380%, Number of Attacks: 3, Critical When Combined with Shouryuusen: 100%
primary.desc: Dash forward while pushing enemies forward
details: Attacks will become Critical Hits if attack is combined with <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/shouryuusen} tip={Shouryuusen (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Willow Dodge
primary.shortDesc: Attack Boost Chance: 90%, Evasion: 35%, Damage: +6%. Damage Boost can be stacked 5 times.
primary.desc: Upon dodging an attack, there is a chance to gain a stacking %Attack buff
details: [Note]: Tooltip mentions %Damage but, it is %Attack

primary.name: Merciless Blade
primary.shortDesc: Status Chance: 30%, 190% damage every 1 sec, Duration: 6 sec
primary.desc: Successful attacks have a chance to apply a damaging debuff

primary.name: Warrior's Heart
primary.shortDesc: Chance: 40%, HP Recovered: 4%
primary.desc: Critical hits have a chance to recover some HP
details: HP heal bypasses certain healing restrictions

primary.name: Dankuusen
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Damage: 210%, Max Enemies Hit: 6 Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Dash forward dealing damage to enemies you pass through
details: Enemies hit with <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/shouryuusen} tip={Shouryuusen (1st Job)}> will be targeted

Can be linked when used first with:<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/shouryuusen.png} tip={Shouryuusen (1st Job)}> Shouryuusen (1st Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/surging-blade.png} tip={Surging Blade (1st Job)}> Surging Blade (1st Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/falcon-dive.png} tip={Falcon Dive (2nd Job)}> Falcon Dive (2nd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/sweeping-sword.png} tip={Sweeping Sword (3rd Job)}> Sweeping Sword (3rd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/whirlwind-cut.png} tip={Whirlwind Cut (3rd Job)}> Whirlwind Cut (3rd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/sanrenzan.png} tip={Sanrenzan Skills (1st - 4th Job)}> Sanrenzan Skills (1st - 4th Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/hitokiri-strike.png} tip={Hitokiri Strike (4th Job)}> Hitokiri Strike (4th Job)_>

primary.name: Akatuski Trace
primary.shortDesc: Akatsuki Trace Attack Chance: 60%, Damage: 440%, Times Activated: 1
primary.desc: Successful attacks with <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/rai-sanrenzan.png} tip={Rai Sanrenzan (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/rai-blade-flash.png} tip={Rai Blade Flash (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/shinsoku.png} tip={Shinsoku (4th Job)}> have a chance to deal an additional attack
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/rai-sanrenzan.png} tip={Rai Sanrenzan (4th Job)}>

primary.name: Shinsoku
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 18, Damage: 1010%, Number of Attacks: 10. Cooldown: 15 sec.
primary.desc: Slash forward several times

primary.name: Hitokiri Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 142, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 8, Guaranteed Critical Attack, Critical Rate Increase: 45% for 40 sec, Invincibility: 3 sec\nCooldown: 90 sec
primary.desc: Dash forward damaging enemies in your path and grants a buff that increases %Crit Rate
details: Attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit and you become briefly invincible
While on cooldown, Hitokiri Strike becomes a different skill to dash diagonally

primary.name: Hitokiri Strike - Angle
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 48. While moving diagonally - Damage: 500%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Critical Attacks: 8\nCooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: Dash diagonally damaging enemies in your path
details: Shares SP with and replaces <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/hitokiri-strike.png} tip={Hitokiri Strike (4th Job)}> while it is on cooldown
Attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit

primary.name: Jinsoku
primary.shortDesc: Trigger Chance: 45% after avoiding an attack, Damage Reduction: 72%, Duration: 8 sec.\nPermanently increases Avoidability by 35%
primary.desc: After dodging an attack, there is a chance to gain a buff that increases %Damage Reduction
details: Also permanently increases your %Avoidability

primary.name: Cleaver
primary.shortDesc: Defense Ignored: 35%, Damage: +30%

primary.name: Akatsuki Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Princess Sakuno appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Removes all abnormal status effects, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Eye for an Eye
primary.shortDesc: After you successfully dodge, you can counterattack with 350% damage against up to 6 enemies.
primary.desc: While toggled, successfully dodging will activate a counterattack damaging nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Bloodletter
primary.shortDesc: Status Chance: 50%, 280% damage every 1 sec, Duration: 6 sec
details: Increases status chance and %Damage

primary.name: Tornado Blade
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 32, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Critical Damage: 280%, Number of Attacks: 7, Pulls in enemies with Stun Chance: 100%, Stun Duration: 10 sec
primary.desc: Twirl around while pulling in enemies
details: Has a chance to stun enemies

primary.name: Sudden Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 56, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 405%, Number of Attacks: 6, Additional Debuff Damage from Party: +20%, Duration: 60 sec. Debuff applies to Boss monsters.\nCooldown: 3 sec.
primary.desc: Slash in place dealing damage and debuffing enemies
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Damage<bp_Can be applied to Boss monsters_>
While casting, prevents you from being knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Bushido's Will
primary.shortDesc: Abnormal Status Resistance: +50%, All Elemental Resistance: +50% permanently

hyperActive.name: God of Blades
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, ATT +50 for 30 seconds, All abnormal status and elemental resistance increased by 100.\nCooldown: 90 sec.

hyperActive.name: Falcon's Honor
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Sword Energy: +100, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 14\nCooldown: 8 sec
hyperActive.desc: Release a burst of attacks to enemies around you
details: Generates 100 Sword Energy when used

hyperActive.name: Princess's Vow
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Sengoku classes within the party

fifthMain.name: Battoujutsu Zankou
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Damage: 1860%, Number of Rush Attacks: 15, Enemies Hit: 11. Able to do 2 or more rush attacks on the same enemy.
Hayato's sword energy recovers by 700 upon use.
Invincible during casting.
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Unleash a barrage of slashes to nearby enemies
details: You are invincible while casting
If there are few enemies, the attacks can target the same enemy again
Generates 700 Sword Energy upon use
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Iaijutsu Phantom Blade
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Sword Energy Cost: 200, Successful hits grant a buff giving +23% Final Damage per stack for 40 sec.
1st Hit: Deals 330% damage to up to 15 enemies 15 times
2nd Hit: Deals 360% damage to up to 15 enemies 15 times
3rd Hit: Deals 390% damage to up to 15 enemies 15 times
4th Hit: Deals 410% damage to up to 15 enemies 15 times
5th Hit: Deals 450% damage to up to 15 enemies 15 times
details: Each successful strike grants a stacking %Final Damage buff (up to 5) and the attack will becomes stronger based on the number of stacks

Can be used during the same time as the following skills: <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/rai-sanrenzan.png} tip={Rai Sanrenzan (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/rai-blade-flash.png} tip={Rai Blade Flash (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/shinsoku.png} tip={Shinsoku (4th Job)}>
Consumes 200 Sword Energy to cast

fifthMain.name: Battoujutsu Ultimate Will
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Sword Energy Cost: 150, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 15, Damage: 380%, Attack Duration: 30 sec, Sword Energy Absorbed: 8 for each enemy defeated.
Deals 615% damage when attacking 1 enemy and absorbs 10 Sword Energy per attack
Before disappearing, deals a final blow that attacks up to 10 enemies 15 time(s) for 2000% damage, 6 time(s) and recovers Sword Energy. Max Sword Energy Recovered: 800
Cooldown: 120 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Summon a gigantic god that will attack nearby enemies
details: At the end of the summon or when the Skill Key is pressed again, the summon will unleash one final attack
While summoned, each enemy attacked will absorb some Sword Energy<bp_At the end of the summon, you will gain all the Sword Energy absorbed_>
Consumes 150 Sword Energy to cast
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Instant Slice
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500. Stab enemies for 1100% damage 3 time(s). Number of Attacks: 10. Max Enemies Hit: 15.\nCooldown: 10 sec
fifthMain.desc: Slashes enemies in a large area
details: Can be used while casting other skills

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/rai-sanrenzan.png} tip={Sanrenzan / Blade Flash (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Rai Sanrenzan
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 13
1st Hit - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 540%, Number of Attacks: 4
2nd Hit - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 550%, Number of Attacks: 4
3rd Hit - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 560%, Number of Attacks: 4
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Rai Blade Flash
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14\nMax Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 540%, Number of Attacks: 8
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/sengoku/hayato/shinsoku.png} tip={Shinsoku (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Shinsoku
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 2570%, Number of Attacks: 10\nHEXA Shinsoku is prepared once every 15 sec, up to 3 total preparations
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Jin Quick Draw
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Activates 10 Chase Cuts that deal 2000% damage to up to 15 enemies 8 times then applies the Jin Quick Draw buff on Hayato for 10 seconds.
1st Strike: Activates 2 Chase Cuts that deal 1500% damage to up to 15 enemies 10 times. Recovers 100 Sword Energy upon activation.
2nd Strike: Activates 3 Chase Cuts that deal 1500% damage to up to 15 enemies 10 times. Recovers 150 Sword Energy upon activation.
3rd Strike: Activates 5 Chase Cuts that deal 1500% damage to up to 15 enemies 10 times. Recovers 200 Sword Energy upon activation.
(Jin Blade Flash 1st-3rd Strikes can be used while using some attack skills.)
Final Strike: Activates 10 Chase Cuts that deal 4800% damage to enemies within range 15 times, invincible during casting.
Cooldown: 360 sec.

meta: Hayato is a STR warrior class part of the Sengoku. Hayato also has a secondary resource called Sword Energy which certain skills consume. With Sword Energy, you also gain bonus stats depending on the amount you have. Hayato also has two stances one for mobbing and one for bossing which you can switch between at anytime
